From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Megaton stood tall taking the shot, his thick scales prevented any major
damage. Another shot, then another. The blows fealt like a few punches
instead of claws. The dragon was beginning to feal annoyed by the winged
polar bear swatting at him. Without warning the great beast snapped his head
forward, biting at Ice's puny body.

------------------------------------------------------

::Prowl::

Prowl nods, weapons still ready. "Why did you come to the Maximal
base then?"

The Dragon watches his playthings attacking as he spoke, "I came to make you
an offer you can't refuse." (Sorry couldn't resist) the mutant was almost
enjoying himself watching the other mutants futile attempts to hurt him.
"And as soon as anyone important shows up I'll make that offer yessssss" His
Megatron side was working it's way into his logic, this was one thing he'd
tried to avoid. The former Pred leader would have destroyed these bots
before the fight began but that would leave the faction weak.

Lunarpine saw the futal attempts that Ice was using and transformed to his
half wolf mode. again he hit Megaton with his howl in the back.

Megaton was caught off gaurd and forced forward, He remained on his feet and
swung backward at the wolf with his spiked tail. Lunarpine easily avoided it
by leaping straight up and over the tail.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, March 19, 2001 3:28 PM
Subject: Re: Ice


> Ice::
>
> She saw her trick wasn't working.  She growled and let her griffin
> mode take over.  Enraged, she flew off the ground and swiped at
> Megaton's face with her powerful polarbear claws. "I can take you on,
> mind tricks or not!" She slashed at him again and again.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> >
> > Megaton looks down at the melting rock beneath him. He reached down
> as if to
> > scoop some out with his claws. In his eyes he had two fistfulls of
> lava, but
> > in reality he had two claws of dirt. He pulled his claws back and
> threw the
> > molten earth/ dirt at Ice. "You will move or you WILL be
> destroyed." he
> > yells knowing that the "teddy" bear in front of him wasn't worth
> his effort.
> >
> > Lunarpine stood up again, the hair on his back looked like
> needles. "Leave
> > her alone monster" He yelled. The wolf fired a sonic howl at his
> nemesis
> > hoping to stop the beast from reaching his objective.
> >
> > Magaton was hit by a solid wave of force as the howl overcame
> him, "If thats
> > your best than I haven't a worry." He swung a wing to the side
> creating a
> > gust of wind sending the wolf rolling across the ground. The battle
> outside
> > the Cybertronian fire was quickly becoming an embarasment to the
> smaller
> > bots.
>
